description: Updates a certificate provider. Requires permission to access the UpdateCertificateProvider action.

parameters.name: certificateProviderName
parameters.description: The name of the certificate provider.

parameters.name: accountDefaultForOperations
parameters.description: A list of the operations that the certificate provider will use to generate certificates. Valid value: CreateCertificateFromCsr. (string) ---

nested_items.name: certificateProviderName
nested_items.description: The name of the certificate provider.

nested_items.name: certificateProviderArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the certificate provider.
